price: The disbelievers will soon[2] wish that they were Muslims.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: [2] On the Judgment Day or upon their death.
